db:info.db:title: Qt SCXML Media Player QML Example (C++ Data Model)

db:abstract.db:para: Sends data to and receives it from a C++ data model.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml scxml CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += mediaplayer-qml-cppdatamodel.cpp \ thedatamodel.cpp
HEADERS += thedatamodel.h
RESOURCES += mediaplayer-qml-cppdatamodel.qrc
STATECHARTS = mediaplayer-cppdatamodel.scxml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/scxml/mediaplayer-qml-cppdatamodel INSTALLS += target
